para.text: displays a list of all of the differences between the two package editions being prepared by the
The list contains the following columns:

li.text: Element name , this is the name of the compared source code element (method, class, class comment, package comment, resource, image stripper bytes, package prerequisites, ...).
Change type , this describes the change.
Left author , name of developer who versioned/saved source code in the pane on the left side.
Left timestamp , timestamp of the version displayed in the pane on the left.
Right author , name of developer who versioned/saved source code in the pane on the right side.
Right timestamp , timestamp of the version displayed in the pane on the right.

Last change , this column contains the latest timestamp of the change. Clicking on this column header you can sort all changes based on their timestamps and this way you can get a timeline of all changes on the package.
